header.title: Hi! I'm Sérgio Félix,
header.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Developer.
header.paragraph: I'm a passionate software engineer specializing in building and designing things for the web. Currently, I'm focused on finishing my degree in Computer Science and Engineering.

contact.title: Hey! Let's talk!
contact.paragraph: Although I'm not currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. If you have any question, proposal or want to work together, feel free to reach out.
